title: This game is gnot like it used to be
body:
Every game I have played of late has had ZERO balance in terms of match making.

Two games ago (both games Ascencion) two of us actually stood in the bushes waiting, for, well, nothing actually. We did plant shrooms and Maokais minions, but to no avail since no one actually came into the bush, yet we still smashed the enemy. Last game, the tides were turned and we got smashed.

I don't play nowhere near as many games as I used to, but seeing how bad the games I have played are, makes me wonder what is going on? Are players leaving and MM can't keep up? Are Riot making changes that just aren't working?

I know Riot made the major dynamic queue change this patch, and that basically ruined ranked and to a lesser degree normals, but it just seems to be getting worse and almost no longer fun.  Over 5 years I have been here and not once have I seen this game drop so low.

Is it just me, or are other players starting to no longer find enjoyment in this game?

replies.body: all good things come to an end

100% couldn't agree more. Match making is the worst it's ever been. I should be able to solo q games and win just based on my rank/skill level ratio and yet I get snow balled and lose games pretty consistently even with friends who I know can play well. Somethings just not right with that.
Not only that but the majority of the games I don't learn anything from because we just get snow balled so quickly that it's not a competitive or fun game. What used to be a grind to learn champs or climb rank is a grind just to be relevant.
